1174398525377011717.text: Failure to prioritize funding for our national defense would undermine the Pentagon’s planning process, hinder our commanders’ ability to counter threats to America, and threaten the safety of our nation. That is unacceptable.

1174398524341018624.text: The bills in this package were crafted with bipartisan input and are free of poison pills.

1174398523342802948.text: I strongly urge my Democratic colleagues to honor the terms of our bipartisan budget deal and work together to prevent unnecessary delays in funding for our men and women in uniform protecting us around the globe.

1113584204154118144.text: During the first 2 yrs of President Trump’s administration, #Democrats forced 128 cloture votes on his nominees. During President Obama’s first 2 yrs, he only faced a total of 12 cloture votes on his nominees. It’s time to put a stop to this historic obstruction.

1088887634523500546.text: I commend the President for his continued willingness to negotiate and find a way to reopen the government. A three-week continuing resolution is a step in the right direction. This is what we need to do for the American people.

1088524652161519620.text: I urge my Senate colleagues to vote now in support of @POTUS's proposal. It's time for us to come together, put the bitterness behind us, and do what is right for the American people: End the Shutdown and Secure the Border. https://t.co/S0L6D018T0

1088480972608290818.text: For the good of the country, I encourage my Democratic colleagues to either join us in passing the President’s proposal or come to the negotiating table with constructive solutions of their own. Saying no to everything will not move our nation forward.

1088480970758590465.text: I reiterate my support for the proposal outlined by @POTUS. This is the only legislation before us that would fully reopen the government, complete our FY2019 appropriations process, & secure our borders with immigration policy priorities from both sides. It’s a fair compromise.
